Statistic¶

class Manteia.Statistic.Statistic(documents=[], labels=[], dataset_name='', path='', statistic=True)¶

This is the class to make statistic of text.

Args:

documents (list, optional, defaults to None):

A list of documents.

labels (float, optional, defaults to None):

A list of labels.

dataset_name (string, optional, defaults to ‘’):

Name of the dataset.

path (string, optional, defaults to ‘’):

Path to save the report.

Example:

from Manteia.Statistic import Statistic
documents=['a text','text b']
labels=['a','b']
Statistic(documents,labels)
